name: Locations
description: Design intriguing locations for your characters to discover and explore.

children.name: Towns & Cities
children.description: Create vibrant towns and sprawling cities filled with endless possibilities.

children.name: Wilderness
children.description: Forge the untamed wilderness, home to hidden treasures and dangerous beasts.

name: Quests
description: Design captivating quests to challenge your adventurers and propel your story forward.

name: Loot
description: Create dazzling treasures and magical artifacts to reward your adventurers.

children.name: Artifacts
children.description: Create legendary artifacts with mysterious origins and immense power.

children.name: Treasures
children.description: Design glittering treasures that adventurers dream of discovering.
